Shopify Video Standalone Section

Learn how to create a Video Standalone section with Sections Pro in Shopify

Description of the Section

The Video Standalone section is designed to integrate seamlessly into your Shopify store, offering an engaging video display feature. This section allows you to embed a video with customizable playback options, ensuring that your audience gets the best visual experience. It provides control over various settings such as autoplay, loop, inline play, and background customization to match your store's aesthetics perfectly.

Demo of the Section

Installation Instructions

  1. Download the Sections Pro app on the Shopify App Store
  2. Open the app and navigate to Free Sections
  3. Search for "Video Standalone"
  4. Click to Publish or Purchase

Sample Use Cases for a Shopify E-commerce Store

  1. Product Showcases: Highlight your products in action with a standalone video to provide customers with a better understanding of the product.
  2. Brand Stories: Share your brand's story, mission, and values through engaging video content.
  3. Customer Testimonials: Feature video testimonials and reviews from satisfied customers to build trust and credibility.
  4. Promotional Content: Use video to announce special promotions, sales, or events in an eye-catching manner.
  5. Tutorials and Guides: Provide helpful tutorials or guides that showcase how to use your products effectively.

Overview of the Configuration Settings

  • Colors

    • Background: Customize the section's background with a color gradient.

  • Dimensions

    • Max Width of Section: Set a maximum width for the section in pixels.
    • Padding Top/Bottom/Left/Right: Adjust the padding around the video container in pixels.

  • Video

    • Hero Video: Upload or link the video asset to be displayed.
    • Play Inline: Enable or disable inline playback.
    • Autoplay: Decide whether the video should play automatically upon loading.
    • Loop Video: Set the video to loop continuously.
    • Show Video Controls: Toggle the visibility of video controls.
    • Mute Video: Start the video with sound muted.
    • Show Big Play Button: Display a prominent play/pause button over the video.

  • Media Radius

    • Round Borders on Image: Adjust the border radius to round the corners of the video.

  • Media Shadow

    • Subtle Shadow on Image: Add a subtle shadow around the video's borders for a standout effect.
